name: burger
description: A restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat. Whenever a user submits a burger's name, your app will display the burger on the left side of the page - waiting to be devoured. Each burger in the waiting area also has a "Devour it!" button. When the user clicks it, the burger will move to the right side of the page. This app stores every burger in a mysql database, whether devoured or not.
author: Michael Wolf
